snippet: About 300 cases of H7N9 avian influenza have been confirmed in China, with more appearing every day.
abstract: Flu experts warn that cases of new H7N9 avian influenza are surging alarmingly in China, with about 300 confirmed cases and more appearing every day; roughly quarter of victims have died.
lead_paragraph: About 300 cases of H7N9 avian influenza have been confirmed in China, with more appearing every day.

headline.main: Cases of New Deadly Bird Flu Surge in China, Experts Say
headline.print_headline: Cases of New Deadly Bird Flu Surge in China, Experts Say

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
